I googled around and found a solution, if anyone else is using Windows XP this may be useful for you:
http://vogons.zetafleet.com/viewtopic.php?t=9978#105857

basically:
1. put this file http://vogons.zetafleet.com/download.php?id=4046 in your resident evil folder
2. open up command prompt by going to Start Run then typing in 'cmd'
3. use 'cd whatever' to change to different directories and 'dir' to list contents until you get to your resident evil directory
4. type in sdbinst re1.sdb
5. buy Mo'Slow 4biz from http://www.hpaa.com/moslo/4biz.asp online then set it up to have speed set to 12.98 (% normal) method 3 interval 1
6. Play the game with Mo'Slow or press the button at bottom to make a shortcut that always uses Mo'Slow with the same settings
7. Enjoy, I am :D dogs through wlal made me jump :3
